titles: Die Veneris, 1 Februarii, 1649. Several passages in a book printed, entituled, A fiery flying roll, composed by one Coppe, were this day read. ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and John Field, Printers to the Parliament of England,
notes: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Ordering the burning of the book by Abiezer Coppe.
Order to print signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
